general.set_expired_error: The Requested Proofing Gallery has Expired!
general.session_dialog_directions: Please enter your email address to begin your proofing session. Your selections will be saved to our server, and will be accessible on any computer as long as you use the same email address to login.
general.browser_error_browser_title: Bummer! Your Device or Browser Isn't Compatible!
general.browser_error_browser_description: This application leverages all the latest browser technologies to ensure that it works seamlessly on any modern HTML5-capable modern browser. We currently support Firefox (version 4 or higher), Chrome (version 18 or higher), Safari/Webkit (version 534 or higher), and IE10 on any device/browser/computer that has a minimum screen size of 1024x768. Mobile phones are not supported due to size restrictions and usability.
general.page_not_found_description:
Not Found =========
The requested URL was not found on this server.
Additionally, a 404 Not Found error was encountered while trying to use an ErrorDocument to handle the request.

splash.login_failure: The Requested Proofing Gallery is Invalid or Unavailable

contact.contact_form_ml_checkbox: Add me to your mailing list
contact.contact_form_autoresponder_message_body:
Hello There! ------------
Hello {SENDER_NAME},
Thank you for contacting us. We'll respond to your message promptly.
contact.order_client_reciept_message_body:
Receipt For Your Order ----------------------
Order {ORDER_ID} has been created, and now available for you to review. If you used paypal to pay for your order, you will be receiving a notification of payment shortly. If you intend to pay offline, you will need to contact your photographer to arrange payment.
If you have purchased digital downloads, the download link is available in your invoice to process and then download.
[Invoice]({INVOICE_URL})
**Contact Name** - {OWNER_NAME} **Contact Email** - {OWNER_EMAIL}
contact.order_merchant_reciept_subject: [{ORDER_ID}] - A New Order Has Been Created
contact.output_notify_subject: Your Photos Are Ready To Proof!
contact.output_reminder_subject: Your Photo Cart is Expiring Soon!

ordering.image_browser_tooltip_favorite: Toggle This Image In Favorites(Up or Down Key)
ordering.cart_delete_confirmation_description: Deleting items from your cart session is a permanent action. Are you sure you want to delete?
ordering.cart_download_all_confirmation_descripti: You are about to download {QUANTITY} {QUALITY} images to your cart for {PRICE}. Are you sure you want to continue?
ordering.cart_empty: There Are No Items In Your Cart

checkout.checkout_package_incomplete_description: You have either a package or product in your cart that requires more images added to it. Please review your selections, and be sure each product or package is completely filled out. Thanks!
checkout.checkout_minimum_count_description: Before you can checkout, you need to fulfill minimum requirements. The minimum number of items in your cart must be {COUNT_MINIMUM}. Please return to browsing and add more items in your cart to continue.
checkout.checkout_minimum_subtotal_description: Before you can checkout, you need to fulfill minimum requirements. The minimum total value of your cart must be {SUBTOTAL_MINIMUM}. Please return to browsing and add more items in your cart to continue.
checkout.checkout_highlighted_fields_required_des: Please be sure to completely fill out all available and highlighted fields with valid information. Thank you!
checkout.checkout_email_addresses_do_not_match_de: The email addresses you supplied don't match. It's vitally important we get it right, as it will be the primary form of notification.
checkout.checkout_invalid_email_address_descripti: The email addresses you supplied is invalid. It's vitally important we get it right, as it will be the primary form of notification.
checkout.checkout_discount_code_error_description: Since you've started the checkout process, the discount code you've supplied is no longer valid. Please contact us as soon as possible to investigate this.
checkout.checkout_payment_method_merchant: Pay now with a Credit Card
checkout.checkout_paypal_price_zero_description: Paypal purchases must be greater than zero. Please either choose another form of payment, or contact the photographer directly for help processing this order.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_card_expired: Looks like the card you are trying to use has expired. Please try another card.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_cvv_invalid: The CVV number (Card Verification Value) you have supplied from the back of your card is either invalid or incorrect.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_processor_declined: Your issuing bank has declined this transaction. Please contact your bank, or credit company, or try another card.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_invalid_expiration: The expiration date you have supplied is incorrect. It should consist of a 2 digit month (MM) and a 4 digit year (YYYY). Please check the values and try again.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_invalid_card_type: We cannot verify the card information you have supplied. It is coming back as not valid. Please check the values you have submitted for veracity and try again.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_zip_code_no_match: The postal code supplied does not match what your bank has on file. Please check the values and try again.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_gateway_decline: Our payment processor cannot accept this payment. Please try a different card, or please check the values you have submitted for veracity and try again.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_filter_declined: Our payment processor cannot accept this payment. Your payment method does not conform to our security standards. Please try a different card, or please check the values you have submitted for veracity and try again.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_temporarily_unavail: Our payment processor is currently unresponsive. Please try again later.
checkout.checkout_credit_card_general_error: Our payment processor cannot accept this payment. Please try a different card, or please check the values you have submitted for veracity and try again.
checkout.checkout_offline_unavailable_with_downlo: When purchasing digital downloads, you must choose a real-time payment option due to it's live delivery.
checkout.checkout_cart_insecure_description: You are about to send your sensitive credit card information over an insecure connection that any hacker with a sniffer can listen in on. Doing so is a security risk that exposes you to security vulnerabilities. It's really not recommended ... you've been warned!

invoice.invoice_email_not_matching: The email address supplied does not match the one we have on file for this invoice. Please check again and re-submit.
invoice.invoice_order_inexistent: We have no record of this order on file. Please check the Order ID again and re-submit.
invoice.download_start_label: This may take some time, depending on how many images and thier sizes.
invoice.download_show_label: Downloads may be split into multiple downloads.
invoice.download_continue_processing_label: This may take some time, depending on how many images and thier sizes.
invoice.download_reset_label: You have reached your download limit. Please request a download limit reset.
invoice.download_reset_reply: Your request has been sent -- we'll notify you by email once the limit has been reset.
invoice.download_notify_label: Something is not setup correctly on our end. Please let us know so we can fix it!
invoice.download_notify_reply: Thanks for the heads up! We'll get back to you ASAP.
